target_markets.market_description: Non-developers and developers wanting to build applications using AI coding tools
pain_points: getting poor outputs from AI coding tools
jumping into coding without proper planning
target_markets.market_size_indicators: Growing interest in AI coding tools like Cursor AI, GitHub Copilot alternatives

problems_validated.problem: People are getting suboptimal results from Cursor AI because they lack proper planning and best practices
problems_validated.severity: Moderate - wastes time and produces poor code outputs
problems_validated.current_solutions: GitHub Copilot, other AI coding assistants
problems_validated.market_gap: Lack of education on best practices for AI coding tools

products_tools.name: Cursor AI
products_tools.use_case: AI-powered code generation and development assistance

products_tools.name: v0 (Vercel)
products_tools.use_case: UI/UX design and code generation using Shadcn UI

products_tools.name: Shadcn UI
products_tools.use_case: UI component library for building clean interfaces

business_strategies.strategy: Measure twice, cut once approach to AI development
business_strategies.implementation: Plan extensively before using AI coding tools, create wireframes and sketches first
business_strategies.expected_results: Better AI outputs, more functional applications
business_strategies.case_study: Speaker's web3 portfolio project using hand-drawn wireframes

problems_solutions.problem: Getting poor results from Cursor AI due to lack of planning
problems_solutions.solution: Implement proper planning workflow before using AI coding tools
steps: Take control as the boss, not the AI

startup_ideas.idea: Clean looking marketplace website for bicycle sellers
startup_ideas.problem_solved: Need for specialized marketplace for bicycles
startup_ideas.validation: Used as example in v0 demonstration

mistakes_to_avoid.mistake: Jumping straight into Cursor AI Composer without planning
mistakes_to_avoid.consequences: Poor code outputs, wasted time, non-functional applications
mistakes_to_avoid.prevention: Always plan first with wireframes and sketches before prompting AI
mistakes_to_avoid.example: People asking AI to build stuff without context or visual references

mistakes_to_avoid.mistake: Making the AI the boss instead of treating it as a co-pilot
mistakes_to_avoid.consequences: Loss of control over the development process and poor results
mistakes_to_avoid.prevention: Maintain control, provide detailed context, don't assume AI is smart

steps: Take code to Cursor AI for further development
ai_workflows.use_case: Building functional applications with AI coding assistance
Getting feedback and advice on development approach

trends_signals.trend: Growing adoption of AI coding tools beyond GitHub Copilot
trends_signals.opportunity: Education and training market for AI coding best practices

actionable_quotes.quote: you don't want to assume it's smart and you don't want to make the AI the boss you're the boss the AI is the co-pilot
actionable_quotes.context: Discussing how to properly interact with AI coding tools
actionable_quotes.actionability: Maintain control and provide detailed context when using AI tools

actionable_quotes.context: Approach to planning before using AI coding tools
actionable_quotes.actionability: Always plan extensively before implementing with AI

actionable_quotes.quote: even if you're not a developer start to think and act like one
actionable_quotes.context: Advice for non-developers using AI coding tools
actionable_quotes.actionability: Adopt developer mindset of planning and systematic thinking
